name: Time Loop Defence
description:
This game was made for my first Game Jam (Black and White Jam), also my first published game, 

Theme was: Loop

Condition: Only 2 Colours

You are a turret that shoots down missiles. When you lose time is rewound and you can choose upgrades to make it easier.

Controls

Left and Right arrow keys to rotate turret

Ctrl to shoot

The vague inspiration  for this game was a 90's? MS-DOS game where you shoot anti-missiles to blow up incoming missiles. Does anyone remember what that was called?

There are more then a few bugs but none are game breaking (that I have found), I will attempt to fix them and upload a final version. Let me know what you find.

Music by: David Fesliyan sourced from fesliyanstudios.com

Thanks for playing.
